price: Hili ndilo kundi litakalo ingia pamoja nanyi. Hapana makaribisho mema kwao. Hakika hao wanaingia Motoni.
arabic: هَٰذَا فَوۡجٞ مُّقۡتَحِمٞ مَّعَكُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِهِمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ صَالُواْ ٱلنَّارِ
footnotes: Na majabari, wale marais wa washirikina, wataambiwa: Hawa chungu ya watu wanao ingia Motoni pamoja nanyi kwa kusukumana na kwa shida, ni wafwasi wenu. Wale marais watasema: Hawana mapokezi mema hao! Hakika hao wanaingia Motoni wapate kuteseka kwa mvukuto wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: hādhā fawjun muq'taḥimun maʿakum lā marḥaban bihim innahum ṣālū al-nāri
